topic: Australia's diplomatic push for Gaza peace and Palestinian statehood amidst conflict.
evaluation: This cluster effectively traces the ongoing Middle East conflict, focusing on Israeli-Hamas tensions, Australia's evolving diplomatic stance including the recognition of Palestinian statehood, and the reception of the Trump administration's Gaza peace plan. Articles concerning domestic climate targets, local incidents (gas leak, childcare), corporate succession (Murdoch), and health controversies (paracetamol/autism) were de-noised as they did not contribute to this specific geopolitical and diplomatic continuous story.
